definition: Wang Lee-Hom (1976-), Taiwanese-American singer
surname Wang
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
to rule/to reign over
surname Li
power/force/strength/ability/strenuously
great/magnificent/macro (computing)/macro-

sentences.english: Wang has released 10 Mandarin and two Japanese albums.
sentences.chinese: 王力宏发行了10张国语和2张日语专辑。

sentences.english: To shake hands with Leehom is a privilege.
sentences.chinese: 和王力宏握手是很荣幸的事。

sentences.english: Jolin and Lee Hom are in China filming commercials.
sentences.chinese: 蔡依玲和王力宏在内地拍广告。

sentences.english: Karin´s Chinese friends all got aware of Karin´s obsession with the music of Wang Lee Hom.
sentences.chinese: 开宁的所有中国朋友都知道她为王力宏的音乐所痴迷。

sentences.english: After Mr. Wang's nine-song set, he called on the crowd to get involved.
sentences.chinese: 唱完九首歌之后，王力宏邀请观众参与行动。

sentences.english: Wang Lee Hom is one of the best male artists in Chinese pop music.
sentences.chinese: 王力宏是华语流行乐坛最出色的男艺人之一。

sentences.english: Wang has established himself as a versatile musician in the Mando-pop scene.
sentences.chinese: 在华语歌坛，王力宏一直被认同是多才多艺的。

sentences.english: Wang's decision proved to be a wise one.
sentences.chinese: 事后证明，王力宏做的是明智的决定。

sentences.english: Chinese-American pop singer Leehom Wang also appears in the movie, portraying a student.
sentences.chinese: 华裔歌手王力宏也出现在这部电影中，饰演一名学生。

sentences.english: Classically trained and multi-talented, Wang Leehom is one of the Asia's leading songwriters.
sentences.chinese: 正规培训的多才多艺的王力宏是亚洲顶尖作曲者之一。

sentences.english: This time it is his behavior that is making Leehom Wang stand out .
sentences.chinese: 这次是他的举动才使王力宏出头露面的。

sentences.english: He wishes to be a singer with talent like Leehom Wang and David Tao.
sentences.chinese: 他梦想成为一个像王力宏和陶喆一样有天赋的歌手。

sentences.english: Wang plays Kuang Yumin, a student leader in the conspiracy.
sentences.chinese: 王力宏饰演卷入此项阴谋之中的爱国学生领袖邝裕民。

sentences.english: My favourite star is Leehom Wang.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜欢的明星是王力宏。

definition: David Tao (1969-), Taiwanese singer-songwriter
Eason Chan (1974-), Hong Kong pop singer and actor
Jay Chou (1979-), Taiwanese pop star
Wakin Chau (1960-), HK-born Taiwanese singer and actor
Li Yuchun aka Chris Lee (1984-), Chinese pop singer
Stefanie Sun (1978-), Singaporean singer-songwriter
Jacky Cheung or Hok Yau Jacky (1961-), Cantopop and film star
Luo Zhixiang or Show Luo or Alan Luo (1979-), Taiwanese pop star
Coco Lee (1975-), pop singer, songwriter and actress
A-Mei, aka Gulilai Amit (1972-), aboriginal Taiwanese pop singer
Andy Lau (1961-), Hong Kong Cantopop singer and actor
Christine Fan (1976-), American-born Taiwanese singer and actress
G.E.M. (1991-), Chinese pop star
Jolin Tsai (1980-), Taiwanese singer
Sandy Lam (1966-), Hong Kong pop singer
Edison Chen (1980-), Hong Kong singer and actor
